query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS teamMembers (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  teamId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('owner', 'admin', 'member', 'viewer') DEFAULT 'member' NOT NULL,
  invitedBy INT,
  invitedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  joinedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'active', 'removed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2qLUrtGoNx4qi5k.feaf103e2c6e --database KVPx8dhkiRjBe7rJpxWYcJ --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS teamMembers (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  teamId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('owner', 'admin', 'member', 'viewer') DEFAULT 'member' NOT NULL,
  invitedBy INT,
  invitedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  joinedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'active', 'removed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL
);
